name: Pirate Metrics
description: AARRR: Acquisition, Activation, Retention, Referral, Revenue. Pirate Metrics tracks the metrics that matter to your startup.

apis.name: Pirate Metrics
apis.description: Pirate Metrics is an API that tracks subscription activity and provides marketing insight for SaaS applications. The Pirate Metrics API allows developers to access and integrate the functionality of Pirate Metrics with other applications. Some example API methods include managing accounts, activating customers, and retrieving referral and other data.
